lines.i: General classification of physical force causing injury

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.51"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11156)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67494-5" General mechanism of the forces which caused the injury NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10109)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MechanismOfInjury 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:10110)
NEMSIS Trace: EInjury.02
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11156)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67494-5" General mechanism of the forces which caused the injury NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10109)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MechanismOfInjury 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:10110)
NEMSIS Trace: EInjury.02
